Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= man; ◄ son of Hanani (חֲנָנִי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) time of kings Baasha (בַּעְשָׁא) and Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of prophet (נָבִיא) Jehu (יֵהוּא)
= someone who receives divine messages, primarily by means of visions

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= process by which humans or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
marker that introduces a different line of thought, which does not necessarily contradict what was said before
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
literally: to find (in someone); hence: = process by which humans come upon certain information

Node.gloss: to sweep away|to put away|to get rid of|to do away with|to remove|to clear out|to purge|to destroy
Node.definition: = action by which someone makes sure that a certain object is no longer found anywhere at all, ◄ as if it were completely consumed by fire
= a pole, ◄ made of wood, ► representing the deity Ashera, and set up near the altar in a place of sacrifice

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to be committed (to someone or something)
Node.definition: literally: to direct (one's) heart
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

m.definition: = town; ◄ located in the Negeb (נֶגֶב) at the southern border of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► used esp. in combination with Dan (דָּן) at the northern border of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) to refer to all Israel

Node.definition: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: to turn (someone to someone else); hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause other humans to associate with deities, often to look for help and support
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= state in which an area has been made inaccessible and strong, beyond the reach of others, such as enemies, ◄ usually by surrounding it by a high wall

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= the outcome of a dispute between two or more parties, decided by a judge or a deity
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= process by which someone experiences extreme fear, ► which may be accompanied by visible symptoms such as trembling
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= the state of being or acting in an unjust or morally evil way
= action by which humans receive something from someone else
= an object, usually of some value, given to a person; ► can be given without any expectation of exchange or often with the purpose to influence or persuade another person

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= event where a dispute between two parties is settle by a judge
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before|read ישׁב (ישׁב)
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their actions
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= a pattern of behavior required by somebody in authority
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

Node.gloss: to warn|to teach|to instruct|to advise|to alert|to dissuade
Node.definition: = action or process by which someone makes someone else aware of something bad that is going to happen, or something they should do to prevent something bad from happening; usually refers to a mediator making known what God has said or implied

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= process by which humans or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) high priest (כֹּהֵן) ► time of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► a commander (נָגִיד) of the house of Judah (יְהוּדָה) during the time of King Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Zebadiah (זְבַדְיָהוּ) governor, tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= person selected from among a group of people to assume a position of leadership and responsibility
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

Node.gloss: to be strong (mentally)|to be courageous|to stand firm|to be resolute
Node.definition: = state in which humans are mentally strong and able to deal with issues relating to good leadership, morals and ethics, war, and the supernatural world

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
